title: Our Family Had a Falling Out Over COVID
description:
COVID drove a wedge between Rachel and Bradley's families, but their children want to see their cousins, leaving the parents wondering what to do next. - Dr. Laura: "Be polite and choose peace over a cold war."

Did the pandemic strain your family relationships? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
